documents.document: "Victorious warriors win first and then go to war, while defeated warriors go to war first and then seek to win." - Sun Tzu #amwriting
"All fixed set patterns are incapable of adaptability or pliability. The truth is outside of all fixed patterns." - Bruce Lee #amwriting
Just want to send all y'all some powerful positive juju to create the you you want to be. Be kind, be excellent! #amwriting #success

"We are made wise not by the recollection of our past, but by the responsibility for our future." - George Bernard Shaw #amwriting #success
"You cannot escape the responsibility of tomorrow by evading it today." - Abraham Lincoln #amwriting #success
"Always bear in mind that your own resolution to succeed is more important than any other." - Abraham Lincoln #amwriting #success
"Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions." - Dalai Lama #amwriting #success
"Freeing yourself was one thing; claiming ownership of that freed self was another." - Toni Morrison #amwriting #success
"A good plan violently executed now is better than a perfect plan executed next week." - George S. Patton #amwriting #success
"Do you want to know who you are? Don't ask. Act! Action will delineate and define you." - Thomas Jefferson #amwriting #success
"In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can." - Nikos Kazantzakis #amwriting #success
"Indecision and reveries are the anesthetics of constructive action." - Sylvia Plath #amwriting #success
"People may hear your words, but they feel your attitude." - John C. Maxwell #amwriting #success
"Happiness doesn't depend on any external conditions, it is governed by our mental attitude." - Dale Carnegie #amwriting #success
"Weakness of attitude becomes weakness of character." - Albert Einstein #amwriting #success
"Excellence is not a skill, it's an attitude." - Ralph Marston #amwriting #success
"What you do today can improve all your tomorrows." - Ralph Marston #amwriting #success
"Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it." - Charles R. Swindoll #amwriting #success
"Error is discipline through which we advance." - William Ellery Channing #amwriting #success
"People who use time wisely spend it on activities that advance their overall purpose in life." - John C. Maxwell #amwriting #success

"When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be." - Lao Tzu #amwriting #success

"Strength and growth come only through continuous effort and struggle." - Napoleon Hill #amwriting #success
"The key to success is action, and the essential in action is perseverance." - Sun Yat-sen #amwriting #success
"Great works are performed not by strength but by perseverance." - Samuel Johnson #amwriting #success
"The art of love is largely the art of persistence." - Albert Ellis #amwriting #success
"Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better." - Samuel Beckett #amwriting #success
"By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail." - Benjamin Franklin #amwriting #success
"A man can fail many times, but he isn't a failure until he begins to blame somebody else." - John Burroughs #amwriting #success

"Success is getting what you want. Happiness is wanting what you get." - Dale Carnegie #amwriting #success
"Success is neither magical nor mysterious. Success is the natural consequence of consistently applying the basic fundamentals." - Jim Rohn
"There is only one difference between a madman and me. The madman thinks he is sane. I know I am mad." - Salvador Dali #amwriting

"It is not because things are difficult that we do not dare, it is because we do not dare that they are difficult." - Lucius Annaeus Seneca
"As is a tale, so is life: not how long it is, but how good it is, is what matters." - Lucius Annaeus Seneca #amwriting #success
"You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength." - Marcus Aurelius #amwriting #success

"While we are postponing, life speeds by." - Lucius Annaeus Seneca #amwriting #success
